CustomField.description: Membership sends this text value to its receipt/acknowledgement mailshop when a donor gives their first gift to EDF and it's at Membership's Leadership Team level. The various text values indicate which receipt/acknowledgement version the mailshop should send, based on the entity, campaign, whether it is a donor-advised-fund grant, and any other relevant criteria. The text values are arranged between Membership Communications and its mailshop, so the mailshop knows by this value which version to send.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Membership's data file to receipt/ack mail shop.
CustomField.label: Rcpt or Ack Version-New Donation Leaders
